meanings: (고체가) melt, run, (얼음·눈 등이) thaw (out), (금속 등이) fuse

vlive.korean: [저 지금 귀도 마음도 다 녹아서 액체괴물로 취직했어요] 이거 한 3주 전에? [You melted my heart] About 3 weeks ago? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [iKON] 요즘 락페스티벌 가면 비와 락앤롤로 오프닝 하잖아요☔️ (BOBBY&JU-NE singing with guitar)
vlive.english: [You melted my heart] About 3 weeks ago?

vlive.korean: 좋아하는데, 너무 아이스크림 빨리 녹아서 흘리고... I loved it but the ice cream melted so quickly and got all over the place... 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [W메이트 14화]팔로워 200만 슈퍼스타인정! 서울 찐 핫플 7
vlive.english: I loved it but the ice cream melted so quickly and got all over the place...

vlive.korean: 이게 녹아서 모르지 않을까? I don't think they would know since it's melted? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 🍦🍦
vlive.english: I don't think they would know since it's melted?

vlive.korean: 그런 차가운데 그 단맛이 사르르 녹아서... It melts down and it is sweet and cool. 듣기 View video Red Velvet : [FULL] 레드벨벳 컴백 라이브 - 짐살라빔 나잇
vlive.english: It melts down and it is sweet and cool.

vlive.korean: 뜨거운 물 들어가면 10초 사이에 이제 다 녹아서... If you run hot water over them for 10 seconds, things will melt away. 듣기 View video GOT7 : [ #GOT7NOW ] Hi Thailand~!👋
vlive.english: If you run hot water over them for 10 seconds, things will melt away.

examples.korean: Flames melted a lead pipe and ignited leaking gas. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 불길에 납 배관이 녹아서 누출되는 가스에 불이 붙었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Flames melted a lead pipe and ignited leaking gas. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ice melts into water. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 얼음은 녹아서 물이 된다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ice melts into water. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The sweets she had left in the back of the car had melted into a huge sticky mess. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 차 뒷좌석에 놓아 둔 사탕들이 녹아서 엄청나게 끈적이는 지저분한 상태가 되었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sweets she had left in the back of the car had melted into a huge sticky mess. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Climatologists have predicted that global warming is causing the ice to melt so fast in the Artic that there will almost be none left by 2040. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 기후학자들은 지구 온난화 때문에 북극의 얼음이 너무 빨리 녹아서 2040년쯤엔 거의 아무것도 없을 거라고 예측해왔다. Neungyule
examples.english: Climatologists have predicted that global warming is causing the ice to melt so fast in the Artic that there will almost be none left by 2040. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When the spring ice melts earlier in the year and forms later in the fall, it affects the polar bear's ability to feed as they depend on the icebergs to hunt on. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 봄 얼음이 더 일찍 녹아서 나중에 가을에 형성될 때 이것은 먹이를 먹기 위한 북극곰의 능력에 영향을 준다. 북극곰은 사냥을 위해 빙산에 의존하기 때문이다. Neungyule
examples.english: When the spring ice melts earlier in the year and forms later in the fall, it affects the polar bear's ability to feed as they depend on the icebergs to hunt on. Add to Wordbook
